short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add features to X. Currently supports adding labels to user profiles, helping you remember the people with whom you interact.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Additional features for X (Twitter). Currently supports adding labels to user profiles, helping you remember the people with whom you interact. Labels appear on all posts by the given user.

Request features on GitHub (https://github.com/blbry/xa).
